action.description: The sales intelligence action to perform

actions.name: analyze_pipeline
actions.description: Analyze sales pipeline with velocity and conversion metrics

example.output: Pipeline: $2.4M total, 47 deals. Velocity: 32 days avg. Conversion: 28%. Stage bottleneck: Negotiation (18 deals stuck).

actions.name: identify_stalled_deals
actions.description: Find deals with no activity beyond threshold

example.output: 3 stalled deals >$50K: TechStart ($85K, 18 days), GlobalRetail ($62K, 21 days), MedHealth ($54K, 16 days).
Account Health: 72/100. Engagement: Medium. Last touch: 8 days. Risk: Champion leaving. Opportunity: Budget cycle Q1.

actions.name: get_competitive_intel
actions.description: Get competitive intelligence for an account

example.output: Competitors: Vendor X (incumbent, contract ends Q2), Vendor Y (in evaluation). Our strengths: Integration, price. Weakness: Brand recognition.
Recommendations: 1) Schedule executive sponsor call 2) Send ROI calculator 3) Offer pilot program. Win probability boost: +15%.
At-Risk Pipeline: $890K (37%). Categories: Stalled deals $420K, Competitor threat $280K, Budget uncertainty $190K.
Org Chart: CEO (neutral), CFO (blocker - cost concerns), VP Ops (champion), IT Director (technical buyer, supportive).

actions.name: forecast_revenue
actions.description: Generate revenue forecast with confidence levels

example.output: Q1 Forecast: Best $1.8M, Likely $1.4M, Worst $980K. Commit deals: 12 ($1.1M). Upside: 8 ($700K).

demoConversation.content: Show me stalled deals in my pipeline over $50K.

**3 Stalled Deals Detected (>14 days no activity):**

1. **TechStart Inc** - $85K - Stage: Negotiation
   Last contact: 18 days ago. Blocker: Legal review pending.

2. **GlobalRetail** - $62K - Stage: Demo
   Last contact: 21 days ago. Blocker: Budget approval.

3. **MedHealth** - $54K - Stage: Proposal
   Last contact: 16 days ago. Blocker: Competitor evaluation.

**Recommended Actions:** I can draft follow-up emails for each.
